channel.title: Personal on Tim Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Tim Thoughts

item.title: Recap from 2017!
item.description: Happy New Year! Here’s what I did in 2017.

item.title: Switched to Hugo!
item.description: Switched to Hugo because people at #runconf17 were talking about it. LOL I liked my previous platform on Jekyll + Github Pages, but I wasn’t really posting much on it anyways. I really like using the RStudio tools, consider this a shoutout to my R community. Thanks to Yihue Xie and Amber Thomas for the blogdown package, (and also for Amber’s helpful tutorial), and Vicky Laiio for the Hugo theme.
